office:text.text:p: The AllergyIntolerance resource returns data regarding an undesirable, physiological response associated with exposure to a given substance unique to a single patient.
A list of allergies for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Adverse events linked to exposure to the substance
Reference to the Patient resource for whom the AllergyIntolerance is recorded
First date the AllergyIntolerance was recorded

office:text.text:p: The CarePlan resource returns data related to the intention of how one or more practitioners deliver care for a unique patient or group of patients during a period of time. CarePlans may or may not be related to a specific condition or set of conditions.
A list of care plans for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Patient resource for whom the CarePlan is recorded
Level of authority of the CarePlan
Indication of when the CarePlan is/was actionable

office:text.text:p: The CareTeam resource returns data regarding everyone involved in the care of a unique patient. This team may consist of medical practitioners, friends, relatives, and organizations.
A list of care teams for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Patient resource for whom the CareTeam is recorded
References to the people and organizations involved in the CareTeam

office:text.text:p: The Condition resource returns data regarding a clinical condition, problem, or diagnosis that has risen to clinical significance for a unique patient.
A list of conditions for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Information to support the clinical status
ICD9, ICD10, or SNOMED concept ID identifying the Condition
Reference to the Patient resource with the Condition
Encounter during which the Condition was recorded
Estimated or actual date the Condition began
Date the Condition was first recorded in the system

office:text.text:p: The Device resource returns data regarding a medical or non-medical manufactured item that is used in but unchanged by the provision of healthcare.
A list of Devices for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Distinct identification required for cell or tissue based products
Serial number assigned by the manufacturer
Reference to the Patient resource to whom the Device is affixed
Notes and comments regarding the Device

office:text.text:p: The DiagnosticReport resource returns data regarding the findings and interpretations of diagnostic tests.
A list of DiagnosticReports for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

text:a.text:span: DiagnosticReport Profile for Laboratory Results Reporting
US Core STU3 DiagnosticReport Profile for Report and Note exchange

table:table-cell.text:p: Business identifier assigned to the DiagnosticReport by the performer or system
Clinical discipline, department, or diagnostic service that created the DiagnosticReport
Test, panel, or battery that was ordered
Reference to the Patient resource who is the subject of the DiagnosticReport
Healthcare event where the test was ordered
Reference to the resource who performed the diagnostic service
Reference to the resource that interpreted the diagnostic results

office:text.text:p: The DocumentReference resource returns data for any document created for any purpose.
A list of documents for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Patient resource to whom the DocumentReference pertains
Reference to the Practitioner resource that created the DocumentReference
Reference to the Organization resource that maintains the DocumentReference
Clinical context of the DocumentReference including an Encounter reference and date

office:text.text:p: The Encounter resource returns data regarding a clinical interaction between a patient and one or more healthcare providers.
A list of encounters for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Patient resource present at the Encounter
List of References to Location resources where the Patient was during the Encounter
Start and end times of the Encounter
Coded reason the Encounter is taking place
List of References to Practitioner resources that were involved in the Encounter
Details about admission to a healthcare service

office:text.text:p: The Goal resource returns data describing one or more, short or long term healthcare objectives for a unique patient.
A list of goals for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Human readable or coded description of the desired outcome of care
Reference to the Patient resource for whom the goal is established
Indication of what should be done by when

office:text.text:p: The Immunization resource returns data describing the event of a vaccine administration or a reported record of immunization for a unique patient.
A list of immunizations for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Lot number of the vaccine product
Quantity of vaccine that was administered
Current status of the Immunization event
Reference to the Patient resource to whom the vaccine was administered
Date the Immunization was first recorded in the chart
Indication of if the content of the Immunization record was reported by the person who administered the vaccine

office:text.text:p: The Location resource returns data for a physical place where services are provided or where resources and participants may be found.
A list of locations can be returned when searching by name or address.

table:table-cell.text:p: Contact details of communication devices at the Location
Reference to the Organization resource responsible for provisioning the Location

office:text.text:p: The Medication resource returns data used for the identification and definition of a medication. This resource can be used as reference in a MedicationRequest resource to define the medication being prescribed to a unique patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: RxNorm code that specifies the Medication

office:text.text:p: The MedicationRequest resource returns data regarding an order or request for the supply of medication and instructions for its administration.
A list of MedicationRequests for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Medication resource being administered
Code identifying the the requested medication
Indicates if the record was captured by another source
Reference to the Patient resource to whom the medication will be given
Reference to the Practitioner or Organization resource that made the request
Reference to the Encounter resource during which the request was made
How the medication should be taken

office:text.text:p: The Observation resource returns measurements and simple assertions made about a unique patient, device, or subject.
A list of Observations for a specific patient can be returned when searching by that patient.

Supported Profiles: US Core STU3 Laboratory Result Observation, US Core STU3 Pediatric BMI for Age Observation, US Core STU3 Pediatric Head Occipital-frontal Circumference Percentile Observation, US Core STU3 Pediatric Weight for Height Observation Observation, US Core STU3 Pulse Oximetry Observation, US Core STU3 Smoking Status Observation

table:table-cell.text:p: Guide for interpretation of the result
Reference to the Patient Resource who the observation is about
Clinically relevant date for the Observation
Date and time the Observation was made available
Indication of normalcy of the result
Result and units for the test or measurement

office:text.text:p: The Organization resource returns data regarding a recognized group formed for the purpose of achieving a collective action, such as companies, institutions, departments, healthcare practices, and payers.
A list of Organizations can be returned when searching by name or address.

table:table-cell.text:p: Whether the Organization is still in active use
Reference to an Organization resource to which the Organization belongs

office:text.text:p: The Patient resource returns demographic and other administrative information about an individual receiving health-related services.
A list of patients can be returned when searching by demographic information.

table:table-cell.text:p: Additional business identifier for the Patient
Indicator if the Patient is deceased
Race, ethnicity, and/or birth sex of the Patient
Preferred language to be used when communicating with the Patient
Reference to the Practitioner or Organization resource acting as the primary care provider

office:text.text:p: The Practitioner resource returns data regarding a person who is direct or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.
A list of Practitioners can be returned when searching by name or identifier.

table:table-cell.text:p: Languages the Practitioner can use in patient communication
Indicator of if the Practitioner is in active use

office:text.text:p: The PractitionerRole resource returns data regarding a set of roles, locations, specialties, and/or services that a practitioner may perform at a designated organization.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Practitioner resource that is able to provide the defined services for the Organization
Reference to the Organization resource where roles are available
Reference to the Location reference where the practitioner provides care
Contact details specific to the role/location/service
Reference to the Endpoint resources describing the technical endpoints providing access to services

office:text.text:p: The Procedure resource returns data regarding a physical or non-physical action that was performed on or for a patient.
A list of procedures can be returned for a specific patient when searching by that patient.

table:table-cell.text:p: Identification of the specific Procedure performed
Reference to the Patient resource who the Procedure was performed on

office:text.text:p: The Provenance resource contains information for assessing authenticity, enabling trust, and allowing reproducibility by describing the entities and processes involved in producing, delivering, or influencing another resource.

table:table-cell.text:p: Reference to the Resource the Provenance record supports
Timestamp when the Resource was recorded
Actor involved in recording the Resource
